article_title: Edward Fitzpatrick: Trump show gets thumbs down from R.I. GOP officials
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description:
I was flipping channels on Thursday night and came across Donald Trump’s new reality TV show. I don’t know if you saw it, but Fox News seems to have found the perfect new vehicle for Trump’s brand of brash and brazen.
Now certainly, the rest of the cast of Republican presidential candidates has tried to keep up with the attention-grabbing star of the show. In one video, U.S. Sen. Rand Paul, R-Ky., destroys the U.S. tax code with a fire, a wood-chipper and
article_metadata.author: Edward Fitzpatrick  Journal Columnist
